mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM inquiry WHERE inquiry_type_id = #{inquiryTypeId}

SELECT SEQ , INQUIRY_ID , INQUIRY_TITLE , INQUIRY_STATUS , INQUIRY_DATE_CREATED , U_NAME AS NAME FROM( SELECT SEQ , INQUIRY_ID , INQUIRY_TITLE , INQUIRY_STATUS , INQUIRY_DATE_CREATED , U_NAME FROM( SELECT ROWNUM AS SEQ , INQUIRY_ID , INQUIRY_TITLE , INQUIRY_STATUS , INQUIRY_DATE_CREATED , U_NAME FROM ( SELECT INQUIRY_ID , INQUIRY_TITLE , IST.INQUIRY_STATUS , INQUIRY_DATE_CREATED , M.U_NAME FROM INQUIRY I INNER JOIN INQUIRY_STATUS IST ON (I.INQUIRY_STATUS_ID = IST.INQUIRY_STATUS_ID) INNER JOIN MEMBER_LIST ML ON (I.MEM_ID = ML.MEM_ID) INNER JOIN MEMBER M ON(ML.U_ID = M.U_ID ) ORDER BY I.INQUIRY_DATE_CREATED DESC, I.INQUIRY_ID DESC ) ) WHERE seq >= #{startPostNo} ) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{endPostNo}

SELECT INQUIRY_ID , INQUIRY_TITLE , IST.INQUIRY_STATUS , TO_CHAR(INQUIRY_DATE_CREATED, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS INQUIRY_DATE_CREATED , M.U_NAME AS NAME , I.INQUIRY_CONTENT FROM INQUIRY I INNER JOIN INQUIRY_STATUS IST ON (I.INQUIRY_STATUS_ID = IST.INQUIRY_STATUS_ID) INNER JOIN MEMBER_LIST ML ON (I.MEM_ID = ML.MEM_ID) INNER JOIN MEMBER M ON(ML.U_ID = M.U_ID ) WHERE I.INQUIRY_ID = #{inquiryId}
mapper.update: UPDATE INQUIRY SET INQUIRY_TYPE_ID = #{inquiryTypeId}, INQUIRY_TITLE = #{inquiryTitle}, INQUIRY_CONTENT = TO_CLOB(#{inquiryContent}) WHERE INQUIRY_ID = #{inquiryId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO INQUIRY VALUES(inquiry_seq.NEXTVAL, #{inquiryStatusId}, #{inquiryTypeId}, #{memId}, #{inquiryTitle}, TO_CLOB(#{inquiryContent}), SYSDATE, NULL)
